subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The suspended Tennessee Titans cornerback Pacman Jones will ask N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell to reinstate him before the N.F.L. draft on April 26-27. Jones was suspended April 10, 2007, for his off-field conduct, which includes six arrests.
snippet: The suspended Tennessee Titans cornerback Pacman Jones will ask N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell to reinstate him before the N.F.L. draft on April 26-27. Jones was suspended April 10, 2007, for his off-field conduct, which includes six arrests.
